snippet.title: Sifu Developer Presentation - Future Games Show Spring Showcase
snippet.description:
We talk to the makers of Sifu about their hotly anticipated new game and they let us in on some brand new information.

Sifu is the new game of Sloclap, the independent studio behind Absolver. A third person action game featuring intense hand-to-hand combat, it puts you in control of a young Kung-Fu student on a path of revenge.

#Sifu
